content.rendered:
For the first time in Indonesia, a Tesla Club has been founded. Keeping with the governments agenda to push for more electric vehicles on the streets of Jakarta, we thought it was time that electric vehicles came together as a community as our fellow car clubs do. #TeslaClubIndonesia / Tesla Club pertama di Indonesia telah resmi didirikan. Sesuai dengan agenda pemerintah untuk menghadirkan lebih banyak kendaraan listrik di Jakarta, kami pikir sudah saatnya menjadi pionir kedatangan kendaraan listrik. Kami pun turut menginisiasi inaugurasi perdana komunitas mobil listrik lansiran Tesla di Tanah Air. #TeslaClubIndonesia
